subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: LaShawn Merritt beat the Olympic champion Jeremy Wariner down the stretch in the 400 meters at the ISTAF meet in Berlin. Merritt inched ahead of Wariner after they charged out of the last curve shoulder to shoulder, finishing in 44.03 seconds to edge Wariner by 0.04.
